column1: parade  she  has  clearly  and  separately  explained  to  the  learned  Magistrate  the
conduct  of  each  accused  at  the  time  of  the  incident.  This  description  of  the  1st
Accused (Appellant before this Court) being the rider of the motorcycle and the
2nd  Accused  being  the  person  who  snatched  her  necklace  has  been  consistently
testified to by her at the trial.
